```{r}
dfeac_productname_partner_id <- 
  read_rds("eactrade/data/processed/eac_trade_df_2015_2019.rds") %>%
  filter(location_id != partner_id) %>%
  mutate(import_value = as.numeric(import_value), 
         export_value = as.numeric(export_value)) %>%
  head(1000) %>% 
  group_by(location_id, partner_id, product_id, year) %>%
  summarise(imports = sum(import_value, na.rm = TRUE), 
            imports = sum(export_value, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(partner_id_pad = str_pad(paste0(partner_id, 
                                         product_id,
                                         sample.int(1000, 1)),
                                  width = 11, pad = "0", side = "right")
         ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  unique() %>%
  rename(from = partner_id, to = location_id)
  
dfeac_bipartite <-  
  dfeac_productname_partner_id %>%
  pivot_wider(id_cols =  c("year", "product_id", "to", "from"),
              names_from = partner_id_pad, 
              values_from = c("imports")) %>%
  mutate(year_product = paste0(year, product_id, to, from)) %>%
  select(-year, -product_id, -to, -from ) %>%
  convert_to_bipartite(id = year_product)

dfeac_bipartite[is.na(dfeac_bipartite)] <- 0

up_eac_products <-dfeac_bipartite %*% t(dfeac_bipartite)

graph_eac_products <-
  as_tbl_graph(up_eac_products) %>%
   activate(edges) %>%
  as_tibble()

```
